name: yelp_compare_businesses
description: Compare businesses on Yelp for a given query and location. Extracts ratings, review counts, price ranges, and categories for easy comparison.

steps.code: const items = []; const cards = document.querySelectorAll('[data-testid="serp-ia-card"], [class*="container"][class*="hoverable"], li[class*="border"]'); for (let i = 0; i < Math.min(cards.length, 20); i++) { const el = cards[i]; const nameEl = el.querySelector('[class*="businessName"] a, h3 a, a[href*="/biz/"]'); const ratingEl = el.querySelector('[class*="star"][aria-label], [role="img"][aria-label]'); const reviewCountEl = el.querySelector('[class*="reviewCount"]'); const categoryEl = el.querySelector('[class*="category"] a'); const priceEl = el.querySelector('[class*="priceRange"]'); const addressEl = el.querySelector('address, [class*="address"]'); const linkEl = el.querySelector('a[href*="/biz/"]'); items.push({ name: nameEl ? nameEl.textContent.trim() : '', rating: ratingEl ? (ratingEl.getAttribute('aria-label') || '') : '', review_count: reviewCountEl ? reviewCountEl.textContent.trim() : '', category: categoryEl ? categoryEl.textContent.trim() : '', price_range: priceEl ? priceEl.textContent.trim() : '', address: addressEl ? addressEl.textContent.trim() : '', url: linkEl ? linkEl.href : '' }); } return { query: `{{query}}`, location: '{{location}}', business_count: items.length, businesses: items }
steps.name: comparison_data
